content: अनुचरः {@--1@} A companion, follower, attendant, servant; तेनानुचरेण धेनोः <ls>R. 2. 4</ls>; आत्मानुचरस्य भावं जिज्ञासमाना <ls n="R. 2.">26</ls>, <ls n="R. 2.">52</ls>; <ls>Me. 3</ls>; <ls>Ms. 12. 47.</ls> In <ab>comp.</ab> attended or followed by; वानर°, राक्षस° &c. {@--2@} Following a spy ( चरमनुगतः). --री, --रा {@--1@} A female attendant. {@--2@} A logical or due strophe.
